pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculates Earned Value for a Project Schedule // Given a project schedule and associated costs, this package calculates the earned value to date. It is an implementation of Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK) methodologies (reference Project Management Institute. (2021). A guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK guide) (7th ed.). Project Management Institute, Newtown Square, PA, ISBN 9781628256673 (pdf)).
